details.title: VXIbus instruments: past, present and future
details.abstract: After a brief introduction to the VXIbus specification which was designed to avoid obsolescence by being an open-architecture standard, some of the many events which have occurred in the last few years to make the VXIbus standard the main platform for test, measurement, and high-density data acquisition, are discussed
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
